reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an exceptional professor who makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable, though sometimes his explanations can be a bit dense.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Davis covers the material thoroughly but lacks enthusiasm in her teaching.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is engaging and passionate about physics, making the subject exciting.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's lectures are often disorganized and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very clear and methodical, though his exams can be quite challenging.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor brings literature to life with her engaging discussions and insights.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez has a lot of knowledge but his teaching style can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez is insightful and brings real-world examples to her lectures.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is a fantastic professor who makes complex engineering concepts accessible.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. White is knowledgeable but her lectures can be somewhat dry and unengaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Clark offers deep insights and stimulates critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about art history and her enthusiasm is infectious.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is very knowledgeable and his lectures are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's explanations are often unclear and she tends to rush through the material.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is good with practical examples but his lectures can be repetitive.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Young is an amazing teacher with a great ability to convey the beauty of music.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. King is very passionate about the environment and provides engaging lectures.

reviews.subject: Languages
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is a fantastic language teacher who makes learning a new language fun and effective.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Dr. Adams offers valuable insights into the business world and encourages practical application.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Baker is knowledgeable but her teaching style could be more interactive.
